Redknapp told Sky Sports: 'I thought he(Bakayoko) did very well, considering he has not had a pre-season. It has been difficult because there have been so many comparisons and people talking about Nemanja Matic and the importance that he has to Chelsea. 

'So, I am sure he was a bit nervous about that but I thought today, he was very composed, he was powerful, completely different to Matic. 

'Matic hasn't got the power to pick the ball up in these areas and run 40/50 yards. He is a midfield powerhouse (Bakayoko). He worked extremely hard for his team today.'

Redknapp added: 'I think Chelsea have got a good player here. Make no mistake about it. 23 years of age and I think in a few years to come, he will only get better.'

Redknapp told Sky Sports: 'I thought he(Bakayoko) did very well, considering he has not had a pre-season. It has been difficult because there have been so many comparisons and people talking about Nemanja Matic and the importance that he has to Chelsea. 

'So, I am sure he was a bit nervous about that but I thought today, he was very composed, he was powerful, completely different to Matic. 

'Matic hasn't got the power to pick the ball up in these areas and run 40/50 yards. He is a midfield powerhouse (Bakayoko). He worked extremely hard for his team today.'

Redknapp added: 'I think Chelsea have got a good player here. Make no mistake about it. 23 years of age and I think in a few years to come, he will only get better.'
